name: Guesser - Stuck in a Loop
description:
This is Guesser, a game we made for the Ludum Dare 47 challenge with the theme "Stuck in a Loop". 

You are a gamer and you are stuck in the loop of everyday live. You Game, Eat, Sleep and Repeat.... Every day..... Always..... Or DO you, can you change enough to escape the loop?

A small donation if you liked the game is appreciated but not mandatory in any way.
